aText.aT1: I am a Systems Engineer and Full Stack Developer.
aText.aT2: I develop modern and scalable web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js), with REST APIs, JWT authentication, and SQL and NoSQL databases.
aText.aT3: I have participated in collaborative projects, applying agile methodologies
aText.aT4: and creating efficient, secure solutions focused on the user experience.
aText.aT5: I currently work with technologies such as:

projectsInfo.description: Efficient and secure link shortener with detailed analytics and customization.
projectsInfo.projectfullDescription: is a platform to create short links with detailed statistics. Users can create, customize, and manage links easily through an intuitive dashboard. With the Pro plan, they have access to statistics such as the total number of clicks classified by device. Additionally, Premium accounts allow users to view statistics by country and use custom domains, providing greater flexibility and professionalism in link usage. Regardless of the plan, users enjoy a simple experience to optimize and track their links.
keyFeatures: API for Link and User Management
Management and Analytics of Shortened Links
